teacheasy.data.lessondata

Class LessonInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.data.lessondata.LessonInfo

  • public class LessonInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the data that describes the information for a lesson as defined in the TeachEasy digital lesson XML format.
    Version:
    1.0 08 Feb 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LessonInfo

        public LessonInfo(java.lang.String nLessonName,
          java.lang.String nAuthor,
          java.lang.String nVersion,
          java.lang.String nComment,
          java.lang.String nDateCreated,
          int nTotalMarks)
        Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.
        Parameters:
        nLessonName - The title of the lesson.
        nAuthor - The lesson creator.
        nVersion - Lesson version.
        nComment - Description of the lesson.
        nDateCreated - Date the lesson was created.
        nTotalMarks - Total marks available.
